articles.title: Biden's 'direct' prime-time address on democracy comes as he grows more concerned about Trump's influence
articles.description: A pair of fiery speeches inside packed gymnasiums over the past week left even some White House aides surprised at President Joe Biden's new-found sense of electricity.

articles.author: Amanda Musa, Dakin Andone and Michelle Watson, CNN
articles.title: Body camera video shows a Columbus, Ohio, police officer fatally shooting an unarmed 20-year-old Black man
articles.description: Police in Columbus, Ohio, have released body camera video that shows a police officer fatally shooting an unarmed Black man in his bed.
articles.content: Police in Columbus, Ohio, have released body camera video that shows a police officer fatally shooting an unarmed Black man in his bed.

articles.title: Putin denies Gorbachev a state funeral and will stay away
articles.description: Russian President Vladimir Putin is to miss the funeral of the last Soviet leader, Mikhail Gorbachev, denying the man who failed to prevent the collapse of the Soviet empire the full state honours granted to Boris Yeltsin.
